From: Bhuvana, Hanker systems bhuvanan@hankersystems.com Reply to: bhuvanan@hankersystems.com Hi,Hope you're doing well.This is Bhuvana an Recruiter from Hanker Systems Please have a look at the below Job Description.

Title: NextGen Business Analyst
Location: Atlanta, GA
7 months contract
HYBRID
Web Cam Interview Only

Key Responsibilities:
Bachelor’s Degree in a Business (Finance/HR) related field.
Experience Business Analyst.
Experience across the SDLC, including requirements, design, development, testing, documentation, training, deployment, operations, support, and main
Ability to work well with business unit SME's, Business Analysts, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams.
Experience working with State of Georgia Agencies.

Required Qualifications:
The BA serves as the communication catalysts, ensuring that agency business stakeholders and NextGen solution teams are in sync. The BA will serve as a facilitator to resolve business process issues and successfully deliver established project schedules and closing timelines.
